recipe

Ingredients

4 Aidells Cajun Sausages 4 units
4 Hotdog Buns 4 units
White Onion 1 unit and wash
Water 1 cup

Nutrition

1240 calories (White OnionData Missing)

3880 sodium (White OnionData Missing)

0 sugar (Aidells Cajun Sausag...Data Missing)

0 fiber (Aidells Cajun Sausag...Data Missing)

0 protein (Aidells Cajun Sausag...Data Missing)

0 total_cost (Aidells Cajun Sausag...Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 18 Minutes

Timer 3 minutes Preheat pan on heat 5
Put in 1 cup Water and 4 Aidells Cajun Sausages
Async 8 minutes cook
     |- Cut White Onion into slices
Drain pan
Turn heat to 7
Async 2 minutes brown hotdog
Async 2 minutes flip + brown hotdog
Take out Aidells Cajun Sausage and put on plate
Put 4 Hotdog Buns in pan
Timer 2 minutes toast hotdog bun
Timer 1 minute flip + toast hotdog bun
Assemble hotdog
